Usage
=====

Installation
------------



To use Icolos, first build the conda environment with the provided yml file:

.. code-block:: console

   (base) $ conda env create -f environment_min.yml
   (base) $ conda activate icolosprod

Then install Icolos from PyPI

.. code-block:: console

	(icolosprod) $ pip install icolos


Once you have a workflow config specified, execute the workflow using 

.. code-block:: console

	(icolosprod) $ icolos -conf /path/to/config.json
